posts.post_title: T206 Sale +++ Lot of 69 ++ Now Individually Prided
posts.post_content:
Everything is closed down here in Savannah due to Irma :(  

Even though now, it won't even touch us :)

Wishing and Hoping the BEST for my Florida friends ........... 

---------------------------

Irma was mainly a bust, but just now getting back to some normality :o 

All cards are now individually priced.

I have removed cards that are no longer available.

Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Hey Scott, glad that you have appeared to be spared for now (also hoping everyone in Florida turns out okay). I'm interested in a few of the cards you have there. Please let me know if you decide to piece them out again.
Just to be clear.....are selling 69 cards for that price or just the ones pictured ?
I count 69 fronts and backs in photos.

Yes, lot of 69, that are all shown.

Also would be interested in any sort of trade :) --- Love to trade :):):):)


Just'a drizzlin', Scott :rolleyes:
Just wanted to say a big thanks to Scott for another sale. Could not recommend him higher.

Thanks JR, always a pleasure :)
